thread.title: Drivers running red lights in Guernsey
thread.title_full: Drivers running red lights in Guernsey | Channel - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Drivers running red lights in Guernsey
text:
Credit: Joe Giddens/PA Archive/PA Images Drivers have been running red lights at temporary lights at Les Banques, Guernsey.
Police received several complaints recently; officers were stationed there and gave out 9 fixed penalty tickets in just one day.
While we appreciate the current works and resultant delays can cause frustration, the dangers involved in running red lights are obvious. We will continue to monitor the situation and take further action where necessary.
â€“ Sgt Tom Marshall, Road Policing Last updated Thu 3 Sep 2015 Travel Guernsey
